Glendale.The Town House (Los Angeles):
The Town House is a large former hotel property built in 1929 on Wilshire Boulevard, adjacent to Lafayette Park in the Westlake district of Los Angeles, California.
The Town House was developed as one of the most luxurious apartment-hotels in Southern California. Built at a cost of $3 million, it opened on September 11, 1929 and was designed by Norman W. Alpaugh.
